segments.en: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,

segments.pli: sappurisañca, sappurisena sappurisatarañca. Taṃ suṇātha … pe ….
segments.en: a good person and a better person.
And what is a bad person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … micchāñāṇī hoti, micchāvimutti hoti.
segments.en: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
This is called a bad person.
And what is a worse person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti … pe … attanā ca micchāñāṇī hoti, parañca micchāñāṇe samādapeti;
segments.en: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom. And they encourage others in these same qualities.

segments.pli: attanā ca micchāvimutti hoti, parañca micchāvimuttiyā samādapeti.

segments.en: This is called a worse person.
And what is a good person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … sammāñāṇī hoti, sammāvimutti hoti.
segments.en: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
This is called a good person.
And what is a better person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti … pe … attanā ca sammāñāṇī hoti, parañca sammāñāṇe samādapeti;
segments.en: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom. And they encourage others in these same qualities.

segments.pli: attanā ca sammāvimutti hoti, parañca sammāvimuttiyā samādapeti.

segments.en: This is called a better person.”

suttaplex.blurb: A good person practices the tenfold path for themselves, while a better person encourages others as well.
